result.execSummary:
The defendant Andra D Bond was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Theft-Movable Property <=$2500 [Modifiers: Party to a Crime], a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 943.20(1)(a).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

parties.name: Milwaukee County Clerk of Circuit Court

supervisions.descr: House of Correction - Imposed and Stayed
supervisions.notes: STRAIGHT TIME with credit for 3 days.

miscConds.notes:
* Provide DNA sample- pay surcharge.
* Pay all applicable mandatory surcharges, fees, assessments, and costs by the end of probation period- any remaining balance to convert to civil judgment.

* Cooperate with any counseling/programming deemed appropriated by agent.
* Absolute sobriety with random urine screens.
* Continue participation at River's Shore Clinic and Milwaukee Achiever.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Andra D Bond

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.
Notice of court ordered financial obligations

records.addlTxt: Justice Point Pretrial Report, received and filed.
Justice Point Pretrial Service Report dated 5/6/16 received and filed. LNR

Plea hearing proceeded. Negotiations placed on the record and confirmed by defense counsel and defendant.

AS TO AMENDED COUNT 1 :

The defendant was advised of his Constitutional rights and maximum penalties, waived all rights, pled GUILTY and was examined as to the plea.  Plea Questionnaire/Waiver of Rights, Jury Instructions and Addendum to Plea Questionnaire and Waiver of Rights received and filed.  The parties stipulate to the complaint as a factual basis for the plea.  The Court found the defendant guilty and ordered entry of Judgment of Conviction.

Pursuant to Wisconsin Statutes section 973.176, the Court advised the defendant of the following restrictions:  Firearm possession and Voting. Defendant further advised that if he is not a US citizen deportation is possible. 

Case adjourned for sentencing hearing on 6/2/2016 at 8:15, branch 38.

Defendant Andra D Bond in court with attorney Darryl Everett Smith.  Kimberly Dorice Schoepp appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: AMI  

Amended Information filed. Copy given to defense counsel who waived reading. Defendant is charged as follows:

Count 1: Theft (Value Not Exceeding $2500.00) PTAC, As a Party to a Crime,  contrary to Wisconsin Statutes sections 943.20(1)(a) and (3)(a), 939.51
(3)(a), and 939.05, a Class A Misdemeanor.  Sentencing hearing scheduled for June 2, 2016 at 08:15 am.

Defendant Andra D Bond in court with attorney Steve Sargent for Darryl Everett Smith.  Kimberly Dorice Schoepp appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant was late in appearing this morning.  Court had issued a bench warrant but rescinds that order.  Defendant is applying to Drug Treatment Court.  Court sets case for trial on 5-9-2016.  Jury trial scheduled for May 9, 2016 at 08:15 am.

Defendant Andra D Bond in court with attorney Darryl Everett Smith.  Defendant Andra D Bond in custody. Joy Hammond for Kimberly Dorice Schoepp appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
Defendant waived Preliminary Hearing.  Preliminary Hearing Questionnaire and Waiver received and filed.  Court found probable cause and bound defendant over for trial.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Wagner, Branch 38.  Original Information filed.  Copy given to defense counsel who waived reading.  Defendant pled not guilty.  Court ordered case adjourned for Scheduling Conference in Branch 38.  Scheduling conference scheduled for April 11, 2016 at 08:15 am.

Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for SUPERVISION.  Defendant advised it is a requirement to attend all future court proceedings.
Failure to comply with conditions of bail may result in an additional charge of bail jumping.
Signed and filed, No Contact Order.  Defendant to have no contact with Lisbon Urgent Care.

Defendant Andra D Bond in court with attorney Darryl Everett Smith.  Defendant Andra D Bond in custody.  William Patrick Pipp appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: LM  
Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Wagner, Branch 38.  Defendant given a copy of the complaint and advised of maximum penalties, right to counsel and right to a preliminary hearing.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause to hold the defendant for further proceedings.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND PUBLIC DEFENDER WILL PROVIDE COUNSEL.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for March 21, 2016 at 08:30 am.
COURT ORDERED DEFENDANT REMANDED TO THE COMMISSIONER ON RETURN OF THE ARREST WARRANT.

Defendant Andra D Bond not in court.  Carole Manchester appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Defendant failing to appear, Court ordered an Arrest Warrant to be issued.  Court ordered any bail posted to be forfeited.  State's motion for Judgment of Bond Forfeiture 30 days after notification from the Clerk of Circuit Court's Office is granted by the Court.  Court makes finding that there is a possible victim identified, therefore, Court stays order of forfeiture with recompense to be determined at close of case.
SUMMONS MAILED. DEFENDANT ORDERED INTO ROOM 221 SAFETY BUILDING ON 6/4/15 @ 1:30 pm
